name: Rensha Soldier
description:
A vertical scrolling shoot'em up game with pixel-art that look like they were projected on a CRT TV.

There is no auto-shooting function, so you have to shoot by yourself like in retro games. The speed of continuous shooting is the strength of the game.

Shoot down the enemies that move around constantly by rapid-fire.

There is only one stage (about 3 minutes), so shoot as hard as you can.

You can also play it on your smartphone's browser.

Control

  • WASD to move
  • N to fire bullet
  • Enter is Start and Pause

Music

  • seadenden

自力連射で戦うレトロスタイルの縦シューティングです。

ひたすら連射！連射！！連射！！！

  • WASD・・移動
  • N・・弾発射
  • Enter・・スタート、ポーズ
